dt-option.name: buttons.dom.collection.tag
dt-option.summary: Set the HTML tag to use for the collection container element

type.description: The HTML tag to use. There should be no spaces or any other formatting - e.g. it should simply be `aside`, `span`, `div`, etc.

dt-option.description:
This option controls the HTML tag that is used for the element that is displayed when a collection button is triggered. It in turn contains the sub-buttons of the collection. Please refer to the `b-init buttons.dom` documentation for an overview of the DOM structure that Buttons will create. In this specific case, this option controls the `
...
` tag that is shown in the example HTML there.
